description: Brindle fuses comfort and function in this superior dog bed breakthrough. Manufactured with identical materials and to the same specifications as $2000+ mattresses. The orthopedic memory foam design will provide your dog with comfortable, healthy sleep. The cover is easy to launder and provides 100% liquid proof coverage to the bed. Now you and your dog can rest better and have the most hygenic bedding environment.Naturally antimicrobial and resistant to mold, bacteria and dust mitesOpen cell technology allows increased airflow, maintaining a comfortable sleeping temperatureMade to fit inside a medium size crate 24" x 18"3-Year warranty covers the product against workmanship and manufacturer's defectsIncludes 22" x 16" x 4" mattress and removable waterproof cover
title: Brindle® 4" Solid Memory Foam Orthopedic Dog Bed with Removable Waterproof Velour Cover, Small 22" x 16"
